channel.title: NPC Emote from Client
channel.description: Possible or not ? i tried but if i try it via client it gives me a nullpointer exeption ingame,when i try to do it via npchandlr to client it wont work because u cant change somthing static in something unstatic.

Possible or not ? i tried but if i try it via client it gives me a nullpointer exeption ingame,when i try to do it via npchandlr to client it wont work because u cant change somthing static in something unstatic.
